unaware of the product or unaware of the company getting them to that stage where they have General awareness taking them
then to the stage where they have knowledge about what we have to offer from knowledge we go to liking from
liking we take them into preference so they have a greater desire to buy from us than someone else to where they have

is about strategy and tactics that push the prospective customers or in other words your finding them the upside quite
